res: @ 1st of all, it's important to note that open communication is key in any relationship. When keeping important things from your partner, it can create a toxic atmosphere and erode trust. Trust is the foundation of any healthy relationship, and without it, the relationship cannot thrive. Additionally, when partners are not on the same page, misunderstandings can arise, which can lead to misinterpretation and hurt feelings. Furthermore, keeping things from your partner can also cause them to feel like they are not being heard, which can lead to resentment and even a breakdown of the relationship. Instead, try to communicate openly and honestly about any issues, regardless of how difficult it may be, and work together to find a solution. Trust your partner is here to support you and work towards the same goal, despite any differences or challenges that may arise.
